attributes.action: Make big business taxation reflect how many staff receive living wage subsidies
attributes.background: We are subsidising living wage allowances while directors and business owners award or pay themselves huge salaries and bonuses

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly how you'd like this to work. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
